changes.change: Added a few additional spells to be selected for pulls etc.
Updated The Rookery around the first boss - the enemies on the floor were rotated 90 degrees from what they should have been.
Updated MDT to the latest version

Darkflame Cleft heatmaps now properly split in two floors instead of overlaying it all on a single floor (I added an artificial second floor to separate the Shadow Realm from the original floor - but heatmaps didn't account for that). Requires a reindexing of data which will happen at a later time!
